document_data.name: The Zoarstar
document_data.mainbody: '''The Zoarstar''' was the guildhall of a [[Guilds of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian guild]] known as the [[Scriveners', Scribes', & Clerks' Guild]].
document_data.Location: This guildhall was located along the northwest corner [[Quill Alley]] and the [[Wide Way]], in the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].  It was northwest of the [[Court of the White Bull]].

Structure.Interior: On the second floor of this building was a library with a two-way [[portal]] that linked to a library hidden within a [[dwarf]] hold down in the [[Maze Level]] of [[Undermountain]].

document_data.Reputation:
The Zoarstar was among some of the more notable and recognizable guildhalls in the Trades Ward. 

People frequently crowded around its windows to look in at its [[map]]s, charts, and architectural renderings that were all displayed on [[easel]]s at its front. One of these maps was always an overall view of the city itself. At times there were even maps on display of far off lands, such as [[Maztica]].
